Phrase: A mysterious old castle had appeared near the Giant Tree of M. St. Iris. Versailles reported that it has been raining for more than a week since the castle appeared.

She and her team entered the old castle to investigate, but they were unable to break the entrance door or the glass windows installed in various places, so they were trapped in this hall for a long time.

How could they have fought for a week in such a place without good light? It's as if they had been perfectly selected for the Metro's special forces. Both Versailles have Miyako have exceeded the typical mental strength of an ordinary person.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: This is where the strongest magic is emitted. It's calm for now, but there is an extremely high possibility that Phantom Mist is emanating from behind this door.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: This is protected by a very sturdy chain. It will be extremely difficult to break through. Now, how should we destroy this...?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: About that, I would like you to form a plan to OPEN it, if possible...

Name: Victoria
Phrase: You say this, but Miss Versailles and Miss Miyako have stayed here for a week with no progress in their investigation past this door or to move on from the hall, haven't you?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Verily, but...

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Certainly the best thing to do is to destroy it.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Miyako said the same thing and used a powerful spell, but she couldn't even scratch the chains or the door. I have a feeling there must be another way.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: By the way, Victoria broke down the entrance to this castle and raided it, didn't you? We couldn't break it no matter what me and Miyako did, so how on earth did you...?

Name: Victoria
Phrase: As I have previously mentioned, we have Iris Cloud's finest Divine Child, the Saviour of the World. With her powers, it is easy to defeat the deceptions and dark mysteries of the Mists.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: And her name is...

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Paddington Elrond!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: ...Eh? Is that me again!?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Surely you are not powerful enough to break through magical barriers and wards, Lady Paddington...?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: ...About that. I was indeed nicknamed the 'Divine Child of Destruction'.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: But that was only because I used to be a klutz that broke things in our mansion! I don't think I could ever be of any use to this mission!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: That will be all.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Excellent speech, milady. That's what I'm talking about, Lady Paddington.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: And now, the magical barrier or sealing spell on this great door will be lifted by Sir Conductor.

Name: Putra
Phrase: What's the whole point of this scene!?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Oh, so it was thanks to Conductor that the front door was opened.

That's right. Victoria first tried to recklessly hammer the door and injured her shoulder; then she tried to break the whole wall with explosives, but that didn't work either, the magic barrier bounced off the detonation.
That's when I finally decided to try to disarm the barrier with Divine Child magic.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Should have tried that idea a little sooner. Victoria sure had a rough time of it.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Victoria charged headfirst to the door before we did anything. There should be limits being a powerhouse. You need to use your head a bit more.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: I used my head as best as I could, literally.
We'll have another discourse on Victoria's boorishness later, but for now, let's think about opening the big door in front of us.
I'll try to inject my magic as I did when I opened the entrance door earlier. If that dislodges the magic barrier or seal, then I'll leave the rest to everyone's magical powers and muscle strength.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Please do. I will kick down the door and enter once the magic is unlocked.
With the Train Knights watching over me, I applied magic into the large door, locked with sturdy chains.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: The chains are unlocked!

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Instantly too, those chains didn't budge then...'

Name: Victoria
Phrase: I couldn't have praised you any better, Sir Conductor. That was brilliant.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Then leave the rest to me, Victoria. I will secure the path for you in a safe and secure manner.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Come on, Victoria, you've got to learn. Why are you running? Are you going to tackle the door like a wild boar again?

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Don't worry. This time I'll use my legs, not my head.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Here I go again. Lucy Squad Combat Skill, 'Jumping Lucy Kick'!
Saying this, Victoria charged the front of the big door and unleashed a Jumping Lucy Kick... that is, an assisted leaping kick. She intends to make a violent entry, as she did earlier.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: However, Yoshino, the brainy one, wouldn't let that happen.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Phew, it's all yosh.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Not yosh at all. Victoria has disappeared beyond the darkness.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Maa, maa, it's better than a broken leg. Shashou's magic removed the chains. The door opened normally.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's pitch-black, but I think I can manage if I use magic to light it.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Oi, Victoriaaaa~! Are you alriiiight~?

Name: Victoria
Phrase: I am fine. I merely rolled down the spiral staircase a little bit.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Hear that. She said she's fine.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Well, shall we go on then?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: So this is the Iris Cloud elite unit. You girls sure are tough...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Are you alright, Miss Versailles?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Ah, yes! I'm perfectly fine. Apologies, I'm just a bit slow...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: If you have any concerns, please don't hesitate to tell me. I will support you as much as I can.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Yes, that's right. If there is anything I don't understand, I will try to discuss it with you. For the time being, I will observe and learn from those who serve the Divine child the techniques of raiding, I'll be fine...
